title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram with Coral Accents
materials: 22K Gold (సువర్ణము) with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster. Adorned with sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
features: Features a central pendant with intricately detailed peacock motif, embellished with CZ stones. The cascading Coral beads add a touch of traditional elegance. The pendant showcases fine craftsmanship with a design that seamlessly blends traditional South Indian artistry with modern sensibilities. The base of the pendant features Emerald cabochons and leads to a dome-shaped jhumka detail. The chain is a delicate floral link.
colors: Warm gold tone complemented by the vibrant red of the Coral
a hint of green from the Emeralds and the bright sparkle of the CZ stones. The color palette evokes a sense of traditional opulence.
occasions: and festive celebrations like Ugadi and Sankranthi. A statement piece for Seemantham (బేబీ షవర్) or Half-Saree function (సగం చీర వేడుక).
description: This Haaram is a timeless investment, embodying the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The superior craftsmanship and use of high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. The blend of traditional design with modern elements makes it a versatile piece that can be treasured for generations. The Coral beads are believed to bring prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift for loved ones.
